page.title: 05One Week's Leisure Time - 2
page.content: On Thursdays I always go down to my grandads with my mum to make his tea. After a while we go home and have a night in watching the T.V. On Friday I somtimes go to guide swimming. I enjoy guide swimming because it is only 30 pence for 1 hour. On Saturday I go to my dancing from 11 o clock to 12.45 pm. After my dancing I go up the street with my friends or just play about. On Sunday I just laze about all day watching T.V or I go out the back and play . In the winter we go out to the top of a hill with our sledges and whizz down. We also throw snow balls and get dressed in thick clothes. In the summer we go for picnics and play in the paddling pool in our swimming costumes.
